meanings.definition: The period before the regular season in sports.
meanings.sent1: During the preseasons, teams practice and play exhibition games.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly anticipate the preseasons to see how their favorite teams perform.
meanings.sent3: The preseasons are like the appetizer before the main course of the regular season.
meanings.sent4: In the preseasons, players are like seeds waiting to bloom in the regular season.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the preseasons sets the stage for the rest of the season.

meanings.definition: To prepare for the regular season.
meanings.sent1: Teams preseasons by focusing on conditioning and strategy.
meanings.sent2: Coaches preseasons their players by giving them specific tasks to improve.
meanings.sent3: Players preseasons diligently to ensure they are ready for the regular season.
meanings.sent4: Preseasons like laying the foundation for a successful regular season.
meanings.sent5: The team's hard work during the preseasons pays off during the regular season.
